articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: Former BBC presenter Mark Mardell reveals Parkinson's diagnosis - The Guardian
articles.description: ‘I’m fine and dandy but I’ve lost a bit of my boom,’ says former Europe and North America editor
articles.content:
The former BBC presenter Mark Mardell has revealed he has been diagnosed with Parkinsons disease.
Mardell, 65, who was the BBCs Europe and North America editor, said he was first alerted to the symp… [+2153 chars]

articles.title: Lululemon settles lawsuit with Peloton over allegations of 'copycat' clothing - CBC.ca
articles.description: Two of North America’s biggest names in fitness have settled a lawsuit over allegations of “copycat” sports bras and workout tights.
articles.content:
Two of North America's biggest names in fitness have settled a lawsuit over allegations of "copycat" sports bras and workout tights.
